CmdLine: apt-get update &&     apt-get install -y wget bash && cd / && wget --no-check-certificate https://raw.githubusercontent.com/babim/docker-tag-options/master/z%20SCRIPT%20AUTO/option.sh &&     chmod 755 /option.sh
Commands.Name: run

CmdLine: apt-get update &&     DEBIAN_FRONTEND=noninteractive apt-get install curl software-properties-common -yq &&     apt-get update && touch /PHPFPM &&     wget --no-check-certificate -O - https://raw.githubusercontent.com/babim/docker-tag-options/master/z%20PHP%20install/php_install.sh | bash
Commands.Name: run

CmdLine: apt-get clean &&     apt-get autoclean &&     apt-get autoremove -y &&     rm -rf /build &&     rm -rf /tmp/* /var/tmp/* &&     rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/* &&     rm -f /etc/dpkg/dpkg.cfg.d/02apt-speedup
Commands.Name: run
